    • createRoom

      private ProceduralRoomDataMap createRoom(int roomX, int roomY, int width, int height, ProceduralRoomDataMap sourceMap)
      Append a room to an existing BiMap.
      Parameters:
      roomX - The x-coordinate of the room.
      roomY - The y-coordinate of the room.
      width - The width of the room.
      height - The height of the room.
      sourceMap - The BiMap to append the room to.
      Returns:

    • addConnectionGap

      private ProceduralRoomDataMap addConnectionGap(int connectionX, int connectionY, int connectionOpeningSize, EDirection.EOrientation connectionOrientation, ProceduralRoomDataMap sourceMap)
      Creates a cutout in the BiMap to open entry for a connection.
      Parameters:
      connectionX - The starting x-coordinate of the connection.
      connectionY - The starting y-coordinate of the connection.
      connectionOpeningSize - The width or height of the connection depending on the orientation.
      connectionOrientation - The orientation of the connection.
      sourceMap - The BiMap to create the cutout in.

    • addConnectionHall

      private ProceduralRoomDataMap addConnectionHall(int connectionX, int connectionY, int connectionLength, int connectionOpening, EDirection.EOrientation connectionOrientation, ProceduralRoomDataMap sourceMap)
      Creates the connection hallway from a connection gap.
      Parameters:
      connectionX - The starting x-coordinate of the connection.
      connectionY - The starting y-coordinate of the connection.
      connectionLength - The length of the connection.
      connectionOpening - The width or height of the connection depending on the orientation.
      connectionOrientation - The orientation of the connection.
      sourceMap - The BiMap to create the hallway in.

    • addOneWay

      private ProceduralRoomDataMap addOneWay(int x, int y, int width, ProceduralRoomDataMap sourceMap)
      Apples a OneWayGround tile to the location where (x, y) is the bottom left corner.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate of the bottom left corner.
      y - The y-coordinate of the bottom left corner.
      width - The width of the OneWayGround in tiles. Meaning, if you want 32px wide, this value would be 2.

    • getDataMapDimension

      public static Pair<Integer> getDataMapDimension(ProceduralRoomDataMap map)
      Get the width and height of a BiMap by iterating through all keys and finding the highest value.
      Parameters:
      map - The BiMap to get the dimensions of.

      private float getChanceForOneWay()
